name: Step2 Fun with Friends Kids Kitchen Playset, Indoor/Outdoor Kitchenette, Interactive Play with Lights and Sounds, Durable Plastic, Includes 25 Piece Toy Accessories, Toddlers 2+ Years Old, Pink
short_description: INTERACTIVE TOYS: Lights and sounds, 25-piece toy kitchen play set, enhance playtime with pots, pans, silverware, coffee pot (food and batteries not included)
FUN PLAYTIME: Entertain your little chef for hours with pretend sink, stovetop, refrigerator, coffee station, and oven, supports role play, develops social skills in children
SPACE SAVER: Compact, fits into small spaces, lightweight, easy to move weighing 24.25 lbs., assembled dimensions: 40.88" H x 35.75" W x 12.5" D
25 Accessories, No Clutter: With built-in spots for every accessory, kids can handle cleanup on their own and feel proud of keeping their kitchen playset tidy
Built for Years of Imagination: Made from durable, easy-to-clean plastic that stands up to everyday play and wipes down quickly to keep things fresh and germ-free
product_description: The Ultimate Play Kitchen! With our realistic molded-in sink with faucet, countertop, refrigerator, pod coffee machine, and oven with functional doors, your child's curiosity and inventiveness will be stimulated. This interactive playset is intended to encourage role play, and social skills development, and to assist your child in making sense of real-life circumstances. The 25-piece accessory package opens users to limitless opportunities for creative cooking activities. This set, which includes pots, pans, utensils, a coffee pot, and other accessories, brings fun to life. The electric stove burner even lights up and generates cooking sounds, offering a realistic experience that takes two "AA" batteries (not included). In addition, the knobs click as little hands turn them, adding a realistic touch. Please keep in mind that the package does not include food models or batteries. Our play kitchen is a space saver that was designed with your convenience in mind. Its small size fits perfectly into tight locations, making placement and mobility simple. It's lightweight and easy to transport, weighing only 22 pounds. The kitchen set's dimensions are 40.88" H x 35.75" W x 12.5" D, providing ample space for your child's culinary adventures. When playtime is over, easily pack up all the accessories in the kitchen, keeping everything neatly organized until the next cooking adventure. You can be confident that our Ultimate Play Kitchen Set is built to last. It is made in the United States and has a long-lasting double-walled plastic structure. The brilliant colors will not chip, fade, crack, or peel, preserving the pleasant appearance of the kitchen. With our Ultimate Play Kitchen Set, you can inspire your child's imagination, boost social interaction, and let the fun begin!

name: Tiny Land Kids Kitchen Playset, Height Adjustable Wooden Play Kitchen Set w/Real Lights & Sounds, 18 Pcs Toy Food & Cookware Accessories, Ideal Role Play Toy Gift for Toddlers Girls Ages 3-8, Pink
short_description: Realistic Lights & Sounds for Immersive Pretend Play – Finished in a soft pink tone with smooth, elegant lines, this play kitchen adds a warm, stylish touch to children’s spaces while bringing pretend cooking to life. Light-up stove elements and an interactive range hood create an authentic cooking atmosphere, paired with turnable knobs, a faucet, and a removable sink—inviting hands-on play that naturally sparks imagination, builds confidence, and supports everyday life skills.

Made with Safety in Mind – Crafted from high-quality wood and finished with non-toxic, BPA-free materials, this wooden play kitchen meets and exceeds U.S. ASTM F963 and EU EN71 safety standards. Smooth edges and a sturdy structure are thoughtfully designed for worry-free play, allowing children to explore comfortably while giving parents lasting peace of mind.

Height Adjustable for Growing Kids – Designed to grow with children ages 3 to 8, this height-adjustable kids kitchen playset easily adjusts to three height settings, creating a comfortable and engaging play experience at every stage. Its compact, space-friendly design fits well in playrooms or shared living areas, offering the feel of a full pretend kitchen without overwhelming the space.

Complete Pretend Cooking Experience – More than a basic toy kitchen, this all-in-one set includes pretend cutting food, a full toy kitchen cookware set, plates, utensils, a cup, plus a chef hat and apron for added role-play fun. With interactive areas like the stove, sink, oven, and microwave, children stay engaged longer while developing coordination, social skills, creativity, and confidence through everyday pretend cooking.

A Meaningful Gift for Little Chefs – Designed to grow with children, this play kitchen blends lasting quality with engaging details that remain enjoyable over time. A lovely choice for birthdays or holidays, it turns everyday pretend cooking into moments of joy while supporting creativity, confidence, and learning through play.

short_description: This kitchen toy set is 22 inches long, 8.6 inches wide, and 31.5 inches high. (Due to manual measurement, there may be a 0.5-1 inch error).

Multifunctional Kids Kitchen Playset - Our toddler kitchen toy set, in addition to being able to assemble into a realistic kitchen that children dream of, is also composed of various play kitchen accessories, a large amount of simulated play food, and many kitchen utensils. The play kitchen for toddlers also has a refrigerator, oven, storage basket, small blackboard and clock, and other kitchen things, allowing kids to experience a more vivid and immersive kitchen play experience.

Electronic Stovetop with Realistic Steam - The vivid electronic stovetop makes the kitchen more attractive! Place the pot or the pan on the stovetop, turn the switch, and the stovetop will light up and make cooking sounds to simulate real cooking. Besides, our toy kitchen sets have added a steam effect. Pour water into the included red bottle and then drip the water into the small hole on the stovetop. You will see real spray coming out of the small hole, adding more reality to play.

Play Sink with Water Circulation System - Our kitchen set for toddlers comes with a faucet and a cute sink where children can wash food, fruits, and dishes. To reduce trouble and waste, the sink toy is equipped with a water circulation system, and the water in the sink will be recycled and reused from the faucet. With this smart kitchen sink, children can cultivate clean habits and environmental awareness.

Beautiful Design & Premium Quality - Our kitchen toys are made of high-end ABS plastic, free of sharp edges and rough materials. Bright colors, cute designs, and rich accessories allow children to play with higher quality. The size and weight of food toy, fruits, vegetables, and other items are perfect for children to grasp, and the high quality and durability ensure that children can enjoy the fun of a kitchen for a long time. There is also large storage space for organizations.

Ideal Educational Gift Choice - This is a kitchen toy set for girls to play kitchen, which can develop kids' creativity, hands-on skills, and imagination. It comes in a nice box and is the right size (Dimensions: 22 x 8.6 x 31.5 inches), making it an ideal gift for girls on birthdays, holidays, and other occasions such as Easter and Christmas. product_description: Product Description This 7-piece set brings a professional touch to play kitchens! Six sturdy utensils, made of stainless steel and wood, are generously sized to offer a pleasingly realistic effect for little chefs. And all of the tools—including whisk, ladle, slotted spoon, spaghetti server, and wooden spoon—fit in a metal holder to bring a shining touch to pretend play! Durable and built to last, the set is sized to coordinate with the Melissa & Doug Let's Play House! line of pretend play accessories. This kids’ kitchen utensils set is made from high-quality stainless steel and wooden construction. The food-grade metal utensils are real-world appearing and are dishwasher-safe for easy clean-up. Our kids’ cooking utensils set helps children 3 to 6 years develop strong hand-eye coordination and imaginative play skills. The Stir & Serve Cooking Utensils set makes a great gift for kids ages 3 to 6 years. Add the Melissa & Doug Stainless Steel Pots set to round out the pretend play experience and to give kids an engaging option for screen-free fun. It’s an exceptional companion set for play kitchens and other pretend play food-themed products. For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully-designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.” We design every toy to the highest-quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we'll make it right. Our phone number is on every product! From the Manufacturer From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!
